question: be forced to listen to the same 10 songs on repeat for the rest of your life or forced to watch the same 5 movies on repeat for the rest of your life?
go without shampoo for the rest of your life or toothpaste for the rest of your life?
have a time machine or a teleporter?

have the power of flight or the ability to become invisible?
have a photographic memory or be able to forget anything you wanted?
have to eat a jar of mayonnaise every day for the rest of your life or drink a gallon of ketchup in one sitting?
answer2: Gallon of ketchup in one sitting

have the ability to shrink down to the size of an ant or to grow as big as a skyscraper?
live in a treehouse or a houseboat?
be able to talk to your past self or your future self?

question: be able to talk to animals but only in baby talk or be able to talk to inanimate objects but only in gibberish?
answer1: Talk to animals in baby talk
answer2: Talk to inanimate objects in gibberish

question: be able to control the weather but only on days that end in "y" or be able to read people's minds but only when they're thinking about food?
answer1: Control weather on days that end in "y"
answer2: Read minds when they're thinking about food

question: live in a world where everyone is a cartoon character or where everyone is a character from a video game?
be able to teleport but only to places you've never been or be able to clone yourself but each clone is half the size of the previous one?
be able to talk to plants but they always insult you or be able to talk to rocks but they only tell dad jokes?
answer2: Talk to rock with dad jokes

question: have a third arm that can only play the accordion or a third leg that can only do the cha-cha dance?
answer2: Third leg that does cha-cha dance

question: be able to shapeshift but only into a fruit or be able to control other people's dreams but you have to be in the dream too?
have a pet dragon but it's always hungry and eats your furniture or a pet unicorn but it shits glitter everywhere?
be able to talk to ghosts but they're always telling bad jokes or be able to talk to aliens but they only speak in riddles?
answer1: Talk to ghosts with bad jokes

question: live in a house made entirely of bubble wrap or in a house made entirely of candy?
be able to run as fast as a cheetah but you can only run on all fours or be able to jump as high as a kangaroo but you can only hop on one foot?
answer1: Run on all fours like a cheetah
answer2: Hop on one foot like a kangaroo

question: be able to talk to dogs but they only want to talk about their favorite brand of dog food or be able to talk to cats but they only want to talk about how much they hate humans?
answer1: Talk to dogs about dog food
answer2: Talk to cats about how much they hate humans

question: be able to transform into any object but you can't transform back for an hour or be able to turn invisible but you can't move while invisible?
answer1: Transform into any object and can't transform back

question: live in a world where everyone has a giant nose or where everyone has a tiny nose?
be able to shoot spaghetti out of your fingertips or be able to turn into a giant hamster at will?
answer1: Shoot spaghetti out of your fingertips
